message.raw:
* Removed simultaneous single and double compilation with autofoo.

* Merged GIMPACT double precision support from trunk.

* Makefile.am cleanups: GIMPACT and OPCODE are built on their respective
  directories as libtool utility libraries. These allow libtool to deduce
  dependencies (no need for _DEPENDENCIES variables).
message.html:
• Removed simultaneous single and double compilation with autofoo.

  • Merged GIMPACT double precision support from trunk.

  • Makefile.am cleanups: GIMPACT and OPCODE are built on their respective
    directories as libtool utility libraries. These allow libtool to deduce
    dependencies (no need for _DEPENDENCIES variables).

message:

* Merged GIMPACT double precision support from trunk.
